UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Designed Tryptophan- and Lysine/Arginine-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide with Therapeutic Potential for Clinical Antibiotic-Resistant Candida albicans Vaginitis.
Literature.Author: Jin L, Bai X, Luan N, Yao H, Zhang Z, Liu W, Chen Y, Yan X, Rong M, Lai R, Lu Q

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=51.7±5.3 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>320 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:28% Hemolysis=320 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=18.75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=4.69µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=4.69µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=2.34µg/ml)
